Description: High growth; investment in public transport & non-motorised transport, including subsidies for electric buses. High mode shifts towards public transport
Significant subsidies to private electric mobility (motorcycles and cars). Strong economic growth, but lower than Omoka.
Strong political will for supporting public transport, but lower ability to provide subsidies in sector due to higher cost of finance
Low growth, weak political will, low access to finance causes 'perfect storm' of high-carbon technology lock-in, leading to high costs
